A series of initiations, including an eye-opening experience with a handsome construction worker, test Lucija‚Äôs friendship with Ana-Marija and the other girls, as she begins to question her beliefs and disrupt the harmony within the choir.

Warping elements of early Cronenberg, Lynch, and Raimi into a deliriously-paced cyberpunk cocktail, TETSUO is a body horror manifesto that‚Äôs fueled by techno-erotic adrenaline and wrought iron perversion. Unmissable.
